com.epam.jwd.task01.logic

Class NecklaceCalculator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epam.jwd.task01.logic.NecklaceCalculator

  • public final class NecklaceCalculator
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class, containing only methods for calculating NecklaceCreator Necklace instances total cost and weight.

    No instances of this class can exist, and all its fields and methods are static.

    Weight of the elements in Necklace can be specified either as GRAM or CARAT in accordance with WeightUnit. Method calculateNecklaceTotalCaratWeight(NecklaceCreator) performs automatic gram to carat conversion (one carat equals to 0.2 gram) and calculates the result value in carats.

    Calculation results are BigDecimal, weight result is rounded up to two decimals using BigDecimal.setScale(int, RoundingMode) method.

    See Also:
    NecklaceCreator, WeightUnit, BigDecimal.ZERO, BigDecimal.setScale(int, RoundingMode)
